LanguageData.BBLK_HeyListen_tickRate_ToolTip: The chase firefly job rolls a random tick from 30 to 120, this mod will play a sound if it gets to the specified tick. So lower numbers will play more often, while higher numbers make it more rare.
LanguageData.BBLK_HeyListen_flyBite_ToolTip: The chance fireflies will bite pawns when a sound plays.
LanguageData.BBLK_HeyListen_fireBite_ToolTip: The chance fireflies will ignite pawns when a sound plays.
